A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a stinking pile of crap. Way to go Disney\, you suck at Star Wars again!\n\nSo much of the plot is a complete copy of ESB. What the hell kind of plot element was with the 18 hour chase in space??? The humor\, though funny\, was completely out of place. The sub plots were terrible. The social commentary also way out of place. Disney destroyed a beloved character. The only thing good about the film were some of the visuals.
